tracks.text: Red light rolls right over humans. Green light rolls left over avatars. Rakuro and Sunraku, Towa and Pencilgon, Kei and Katzo, Rei and Psyger-0.
A green tower stands behind a fountain in the middle of a red-bricked town. Day turns to night. Red text, Shangri-La Frontier.
Sunraku stands in the Inventoria
Pencilgon and Katzo stand back to back in the ruins.
A mail bird lands on Psyger-0's arm.
A ninja runs at night through the ruins.
Ether Reactor, Operations Unit, Golden Crystal sphere, Idols
Professor in library
Psyger-100 in town
Emul runs from SF Zoo
Bilac hammers in a forge. Amariys sips coffee. A pink-haired woman and man stand on a roof near satellite dishes.
A computer sits in the Utopia reference room.
Sunraku flies through the crystal nest fighting scorpions.
Sunraku flies through the Ruins, fighting golems.
A mecha stares up. Blue and red mecha fly around and fight. The pink haired woman is in the red mecha.
A spiky golem in the ruins.
The Gatekeeper's arms glow blue.
The Golden Crystal scorpion.
A blue haired ninja girl makes hand signals.
Sunraku stares up at agiant mountain of metal trash.
Pencilgon swings a golden spear.
Katzo red fist punches the Gatekeeper.
Psyger-0 holds a sword and takes her dark form.
Sunraku wears a mask and holds crystal arm guns.
Clouds cover the moon.
A shadowy wolf lunges from the darkness.
Text, 31, After the Fierce Battle, Despair
Psyger-100 in townT
Eighthold
An NPC spreads water from a bucket in front of a store. Another NPC pulls weeds from a flower point in the early morning light.
The gardener drops a plant as a horned cat with a spiral tail walks by.
Sunraku walks down the street, across a bridge, and down an alley.
She jumps over to the wall and conjures a white door.
She hops on his shoulder and he opens the door.
The door closes behind them and disappears.
Her eyes are wide.
He hands her the sphere.
She stands paralyzed
She punches him.
He lies prone on the ground.
Ether reactor
He spins around and tosses her in the air.
She back flips and ricochets off the wall.
His wrist glows and he disappears.
The Inventoria
He looks down
Lycagon's mark
In the forge, the teleportation light glows.
He stumbles
He grabs Emul, his eyes unhinged.
Cannot equip
Rakuro's house, mid-day
Children ride bicycles. A car drives by. A woman in a long, modest skirt walks under a pale pink parasol lined with flowers. She wears a bag labeled Judo.
The woman walks by Rakuro's house.
Another car drives by.
Rei Saiga backs up and peers at the house.
She looks at the name plate, reading Hizutome, spelled man + service. She looks up at a bedroom window, the curtains drawn back.
Her eyes sparkle. She looks down. 3 elementary aged kids stare at her.
She runs away.
Condensation sweats down an energy drink. Rakuro slumps on a couch while Rumi reads a fashion magazine starring Towa Amane.
She jumps and spills barley tea on her pink shirt.
He looks at VR game discs on the shelf labelled Not Trash.
Blue, scratched up text reads Nephilim Hollow. A neon diamond surrounds the N and H. The diamond spins and grows, forming a tunnel.
Light flashes across Rakuro's eyeball
Sunraku's avatar is a white and black robot wearing a gray jacket. Standing in a hangar, he looks up to see a 100 foot mecha with orange legs and blue arms and torso.
Rubble lines the empty streets of a post-apocalyptic urban area. Grass and shrubs grows on the roofs of crumbling buildings.

Kingfisher sits on a collapsed overpass. Sunraku sits on Kingfisher's shoulder, looking at a dialog screen. Duel List, includes name, score, and result. Names include shadow strider, night shade, crimson mage, sky hunter, and miyamoto
A tanky, brown mecha spies him from a nearby roof.
and leaps down next to him.
Sunraku looks as the brown mecha stands.
The man has a brown afro.
Text, Super Ballman has challenged you.
He places his hand on the mecha, flickers, and disappears. Sunraku watches.
Sunraku places his hand on Kingfisher, flickers, and disappears.
Kingfisher's eyes glow red and stands up.
Kingfisher's wings engage.
Big Dog shoots a shoulder-mounted missile.
Kingfisher takes off and flies evasively.
He shoots a laser gun.
He swings. Big Dog dodges and shoots laser beams. Kingfisher flies evasively.
Rakuro grins.
Big Dog shoots a laser. It ricochets off the ground.
Kingfisher spins, leaps, and ricochets off a building.
Big Dog punches. Kingfisher swings.
The bridge collapses. Kingfisher falls, and rubble piles on top of him.
A cloud of dirt obscures the crash site. Big Dog lands nearby, missing his shoulder turret.
The cloud begins to clear.
He charges the rubble. A light shines and shoots out of the rubble. Big Dog dodges.
A streak explodes from the rubble pile and flies into the sky. Big Dog gives chase.
Kingfisher points his gun.
Kingfisher shoots from the ground. Big Dog explodes in mid air.
Kingfisher gets up, takes a few steps, and pauses.
Sunraku appears on the ground.
A red mecha leg stands nearby
Rust is a woman with brown and pink hair and a scar across her face. Her mecha is red with twin swords.
Text, 34, Window shopping
Sunraku's eyes are wide and bloodshot. He pants, fogging up a window.
3 players shop in an Armor store.
They run out of the store. Sunraku doesn't move.
Text, He just can't buy chest or leg equipment because of Lycagon's Mark
